title-group.subtitle: Implementing a Statewide Law in an Urban School District

contrib.aff: Student, Family and Community Support Department, San Francisco Unified School District, San Francisco, CA

ack.p: The author would like to recognize San Francisco Unified School District champions Diane Goldman, MSN, PNP, RN, Coordinator of School Health Center and Section 504 Services; Kevin Truitt, Associate Superintendent; and Karen Lem, retired Counseling Secretary, George Washington High School, for their “fiercely” dedicated implementation of AB 354, and Heidi Anderson, Public Outreach and Communication Office; Donna Blanchard, Student, Family, and Community Support Department Administrator; and Warren Tang, Student Information Systems; for their behind-thescenes wizardry.

bio.p: As an advocate for public health services, Lynda has presented and written extensively on adolescent vaccinations, including online continuing education modules for the National Association of School Nursing and the American School Health Association and how-to manuals. She welcomes every opportunity in making prevention a priority.
